document.title: Employment Implications of U.S. Immigration Policy
document.abstract: Public testimony by Prof. Briggs given before the before the Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law of the Committee on the Judiciary, House of Representatives, July 21, 1987.

field.name: comments
field.value:
Suggested Citation:
Briggs, V. (1987). Employment Implications of U.S. Immigration Policy. In Legal Immigration-Occupational Preferences: Hearing Before the Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law of the Committee on the Judiciary, House of Representatives, pp. 17-26, (see also pp. 14-16 and 42-71 for oral comments). Washington, DC: U.S. Government Printing Office.
http://digitalcommons.ilr.cornell.edu/briggstestimonies/10
